MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH2 postcode area of Edinburgh. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2pm to repair a fault on our underground cable network caused by third party damaged and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:45pm on the 26th of March 2021.
